item.description:
Guilford Art Center celebrates their 51st craft expo on the beautiful Guilford Green. There is a silent auction, food, kids' crafts table, and something for everyone! Exhibitors come from all over the country for this show, bringing their high-quality works of art, jewelry, furniture, glassware... and much more.

More information is available at www.guilfordartcenter.org/expo.html

I will get there early, and we can meet by the entrance. Cost is $7 general admission, and free for members. Paid and free parking is available around the green, on some side streets, and in marked lots.

If anyone is interested, we can grab a bite to eat afterwards at Chip's Pub or wherever you choose. Please call or email me with any questions!

For new members and those that get there later, my cell is 860.227.7498 ~
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing tan shorts and a blue t-shirt with a tan zebra on it.
item.name: Guilford Craft Expo
